forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
